body_html:
FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '\\\\?\\bazel-out\\host\\bin\\third_party\\llvm\\expand_cmake_vars'

This is obviously a bug in Bazel's python stub template, sorry I didn't test 0.4.5 for TensorFlow GPU build, I'll fix it at Bazel HEAD soon.

This is obviously a bug in Bazel's python stub template, sorry I didn't test 0.4.5 for TensorFlow GPU build, I'll fix it at Bazel HEAD soon.
body:
```
FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '\\\\?\\bazel-out\\host\\bin\\third_party\\llvm\\expand_cmake_vars'
```
This is obviously a bug in Bazel's [python stub template](https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/blob/master/src/main/java/com/google/devtools/build/lib/bazel/rules/python/stub_template.txt#L15), sorry I didn't test 0.4.5 for TensorFlow GPU build, I'll fix it at Bazel HEAD soon.
